testcase.classname: User uses parameters in Configurations.Properties file
testcase.name: TC09 User should be able to visit Amazon
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "amazonUrl" webpage.........................................passed Then Test that url has "amazon" in it.......................................passed Then User closes the page...................................................passed

testcase.classname: User uses parameters in Configurations.Properties file
testcase.name: TC11 User should be able to visit walmart page
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "walmartUrl" webpage........................................passed Then Test that url has "walmart" in it......................................passed Then User closes the page...................................................passed

testcase.classname: User should not be able to login with invalid username or password
testcase.name: TC15 Negative login Test with invalid userName and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "qdUrl" webpage.............................................passed When User clicks on homepage LoginButton....................................passed And User will enter an "qdInValidEmail" to email box........................passed And User will enter a "qdInValidPassword" to password box...................passed And User will click on loginPage LoginButton................................passed Then Test that user could not be login......................................passed And User will wait for 3 sec................................................passed And User closes the page....................................................passed

testcase.name: TC20 User should be able to test new tab
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "webUrl" webpage............................................passed Then Scroll down to Login Portal............................................passed And Click Login Portal......................................................passed And Switch to other window..................................................passed And Write values in the "username" and "password" boxes.....................passed And Press the login button..................................................passed Then Test that the popup text is "validation failed"........................passed And Close the Popup by saying Ok............................................passed And Go back to the first page...............................................passed Then Test that the first page is returned...................................passed And User closes all pages...................................................passed
